0.59.name: wordpress/bp-events
0.59.description: the bp-events plugin will add an option to the user menu called "Events". From this menu users can create events and invite friends to join. - the plugin will add an "Events" option to tne main menu system for the events directory view - add the "Events" widget to list the upcoming/newest/active/popular events on your front page
